TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit AxHost/ConnectionPointCookie extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Connects an ActiveX control to a client that handles the control’s events.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Controles ActiveX se comunicar com clientes por meio de sua interface COM. O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.ConnectionPointCookie> classe fornece o vínculo entre o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost> classe e o controle ActiveX.
Para obter mais informações, consulte "Eventos no e conectável objetos COM" na biblioteca MSDN em http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

MemberSignature.Value: public ConnectionPointCookie (object source, object sink, Type eventInterface);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object source, object sink, class System.Type eventInterface) cil managed
Public Sub New (source As Object, sink As Object, eventInterface As Type)
public: ConnectionPointCookie(System::Object ^ source, System::Object ^ sink, Type ^ eventInterface);

Docs.param: A connectable object that contains connection points.
The client's sink which receives outgoing calls from the connection point.
The outgoing interface whose connection point object is being requested.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.ConnectionPointCookie.%23ctor%2A> construtor estabelece uma conexão entre o cliente e o controle ActiveX.

Docs.exception: does not implement . -or- does not implement .
The connection point has already reached its limit of connections and cannot accept any more.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Disconnect() cil managed

Docs.summary: Disconnects the ActiveX control from the client.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

Docs.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Este método substitui <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>. O código do aplicativo não deve chamar este método; o método `Finalize` de um objeto é invocado automaticamente durante a coleta de lixo, a menos que a finalização pelo coletor de lixo tenha sido desabilitada por uma chamada para o método <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>.
Para obter mais informações, consulte [métodos Finalize e destruidores](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), e [substituindo o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
